help-file.title: "ANIMATE DEAD"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Animation lasts until the undead follower dies (again) Type of spell: Summoning
"Animate Dead" allows the Necromancer to animate up to 12 corpses (the precise number is dependent on the proficiency of the caster). The corpses will follow the Necromancer for a limited time or until their destruction. A corpse can only be animated once.
There are whispered hints of further mysteries within this spell.
